languages.text: {n}Идира обреченно трясет головой, явно зная наперед, чем закончится эта сцена.{/n} "Не смотри, Джай... не смотри..."
{n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира обреченно трясет головой, явно зная наперед, чем закончится эта сцена.{/n} "Не смотри, Джай... не смотри..."

languages.text: {n}Idira secoue la tête d'un air abattu, comme si elle savait déjà comment tout cela allait finir.{/n} « Fermez les yeux, Jae... Fermez les yeux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira secoue la tête d'un air abattu, comme si elle savait déjà comment tout cela allait finir.{/n} « Fermez les yeux, Jae... Fermez les yeux... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは落胆して首を振った。彼女はすでにこの結末に気づいているに違いない。{/n}「見ないで、ジェイ…見てはいけないわ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは落胆して首を振った。彼女はすでにこの結末に気づいているに違いない。{/n}「見ないで、ジェイ…見てはいけないわ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉消沉地摇了摇头。很显然，她很清楚这一幕会如何结束。{/n}“别看，婕伊……别看了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉消沉地摇了摇头。很显然，她很清楚这一幕会如何结束。{/n}“别看，婕伊……别看了……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schüttelt niedergeschlagen den Kopf — sie weiß wohl bereits, wie diese Szene enden wird.{/n} "Seht nicht hin, Jae ... Seht nicht hin ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schüttelt niedergeschlagen den Kopf — sie weiß wohl bereits, wie diese Szene enden wird.{/n} "Seht nicht hin, Jae ... Seht nicht hin ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira menea la cabeza, afligida. Ya sabe cómo termina esto.{/n} «No mires, Jae... No mires...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira menea la cabeza, afligida. Ya sabe cómo termina esto.{/n} «No mires, Jae... No mires...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, başını ümitsizce sallıyor. Bu olayın nasıl sonuçlanacağını çoktan biliyor gibi.{/n} "Bakma Jae... Bakma..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head despondently — she must already know how this scene is going to end.{/n} "Don't look, Jae... Don't look..."
